languages.text: "Это и есть очищение души, элантах. Надеюсь теперь ты понимаешь, сколь важно беречь ее от лишнего мусора".
"This is the cleansing of your soul, elantach. I hope that now you understand the importance of keeping it free from unnecessary litter."
languages.original_text: "Это и есть очищение души, элантах. Надеюсь теперь ты понимаешь, сколь важно беречь ее от лишнего мусора".

traits.locale_text: "This is the soul cleansing, elantach. I hope that you understand the importance of keeping it clean from excessive trash now."
"This is the soul cleansing, elantach. I hope that you understand the importance of keeping it clean from excessive trash now."
"This is the cleansing of your soul, elantach. I hope that now you understand the importance of keeping it free from unnecessary litter."
"This is the cleansing of your soul, elantach. I hope that now you understand the importance of keeping it free from unnecessary litter."
"This is the cleansing of your soul, elantach. I hope that now you understand the importance of keeping it free from unnecessary litter."

languages.text: “这就是灵魂的净化，外界人。我希望你已经完全明白为什么要保持灵魂的洁净，远离不必要的垃圾。”
languages.original_text: "This is the cleansing of your soul, elantach. I hope that now you understand the importance of keeping it free from unnecessary litter."

traits.locale_text: “这就是灵魂的净化，外界人。我希望你已经完全明白为什么要保持灵魂的洁净，远离不必要的垃圾。”

languages.text: «Eso se debe a que estás expurgando tu alma, elantach. Confío en que ahora comprendas la importancia de mantenerla libre de basura innecesaria».
languages.original_text: "This is the cleansing of your soul, elantach. I hope that now you understand the importance of keeping it free from unnecessary litter."

traits.locale_text: «Eso se debe a que estás expurgando tu alma, elantach. Confío en que ahora comprendas la importancia de mantenerla libre de basura innecesaria».

languages.text: « C'est l'effet de la purification de votre âme, elantach. J'espère que vous comprenez maintenant pourquoi il faut veiller à évacuer tous ces déchets. »
languages.original_text: "This is the cleansing of your soul, elantach. I hope that now you understand the importance of keeping it free from unnecessary litter."

traits.locale_text: « C'est l'effet de la purification de votre âme, elantach. J'espère que vous comprenez maintenant pourquoi il faut veiller à évacuer tous ces déchets. »

languages.text: "Das ist die Reinigung Eurer Seele, Elantach. Ich hoffe, Ihr versteht jetzt, wie wichtig es ist, sie frei von unnötigem Abfall zu halten."
languages.original_text: "This is the cleansing of your soul, elantach. I hope that now you understand the importance of keeping it free from unnecessary litter."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist die Reinigung Eurer Seele, Elantach. Ich hoffe, Ihr versteht jetzt, wie wichtig es ist, sie frei von unnötigem Abfall zu halten."

languages.text: 「エランタ、これが魂の浄化だ。不純物で汚さないことの大切さを理解してほしい」
languages.original_text: "This is the cleansing of your soul, elantach. I hope that now you understand the importance of keeping it free from unnecessary litter."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、これが魂の浄化だ。不純物で汚さないことの大切さを理解してほしい」

languages.text: "Ruhun temizlendi elantach. Umarım onu gereksiz pisliklerden arındırmanın önemini anlamışsındır."
languages.original_text: "This is the cleansing of your soul, elantach. I hope that now you understand the importance of keeping it free from unnecessary litter."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhun temizlendi elantach. Umarım onu gereksiz pisliklerden arındırmanın önemini anlamışsındır."
